title: Any tuturial about Kerning arabic font in MS Volt?
content: Any tutorial about how to kerning in Arabic font in MS Volt? I need to know the right way to kerning
author: ott

comments.content:
Salaams  
The two volumes of Arabic font making by Stéphane Boeuf published by khtt.org are a valuable resource that deals with various aspects of VOLT. Not kerning specifically but they may help you figure it out.  
 [http://www.khtt.net/page/31752/en](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140000/http:/www.khtt.net/page/31752/en "http://www.khtt.net/page/31752/en")  
Hasan Abu Afash of Hiba Studio in Gaza is highly recommended as a real professional expert of Volting Arabic, including kerning. I am sure he can answer you despite the sad loss he suffered during the recent war - house damaged and brother killed in another incident...  
 [http://hibastudio.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140000/http:/hibastudio.com/ "http://hibastudio.com/")  
Vladimir
